name: todoist-google-calendar-sidebar
description: Adds a resizable Todoist sidebar to Google Calendar for seamless task management
author: Jordan Strauss

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run bundle
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy-assets && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip .
scripts.copy-assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp main.css dist/ && cp options.html dist/ && cp -r jQuery dist/
